name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TagU - Team Collaboration on the Web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Leave cluttered and inefficient team communication in the past.

With TagU, reporting bugs, discussing design, leaving feedback, and sharing ideas become easier than ever before. 🎉

TagU turns your browser into a collaboration powerhouse, where your team can interact seamlessly on web pages. It’s perfect for developers, designers, project managers, and anyone who wants a smarter way to work together. 

With TagU, you can enjoy streamlined communication at your fingertips, with virtual sticky notes. 📝

----------------------------How It Works--------------------
Your entire team can drop virtual sticky note comments around the web, allowing for developers, designers, project managers, and more to enjoy real-time feedback directly on any webpage.

👋 Say goodbye to endless screenshots!

🎥 No more lengthy screen-recordings!

🤯 Leave confusing email threads in the past!

Ready to transform the way your team works? TagU is here to make that happen. It’s simple, efficient, and integrates seamlessly into your Chrome browser. Say goodbye to the hurdles of traditional team collaboration and embrace a future where productivity and innovation go hand in hand. 🚀

Download TagU (BETA) today and start your journey to better, more efficient teamwork. 

Visit us at trytagu.com and unleash the true potential of your team! 🌟

-------------Privacy-------------
At TagU, we take your privacy seriously. Your data is never shared with 3rd party services or advertisers. You can use TagU with confidence, knowing that your data is safe and secure.

-------------Questions?-------------
Have any questions, or suggestions to make TagU even better?

Contact us anytime => tagucontact@gmail.com
